author: Home Repair Tutor
description:
This video shares how to install a PEX A shutoff valve using the HoldRite fixture outlet box. Many thanks to HoldRite for sponsoring this tutorial. For the written tutorial and list of materials, visit https://homerepairtutor.com/holdrite-fixture-outlet-box/

#plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor   

PEX A Shutoff Valve Installation with the HoldRite Fixture Outlet Box
0:01 How to connect HoldRite Fixture Outlet Box to PEX A
1:28 How to fasten Fixture Outlet Box to HoldRite 170 bracket
2:52 How to add debris covers to Fixture Outlet Box

These supplies were used in our video:

-HoldRite Fixture Outlet Box with PEX A 
-HoldRite 170 Bracket
-SharkBite PEX A Expansion Ring
-SharkBite PEX A Coupling
-Milwaukee M12 Expansion Tool

Some product links may be Amazon affiliate links. As an Amazon Associate, we earn from qualifying purchases at no additional cost to you. 

Want our newest DIY videos? Subscribe to our channel and hit the notification bell to see every upload. We upload new
title: PEX A Shutoff Valve Installation with the HoldRite Fixture Outlet Box
